Sunday Ski Lessons

7 weeks, beginning January 11, 2026

No classes will be held on Sunday, February 15 due to the President’s Day Holiday.

All classes are held from 9:45am-12:15pm

Program 7 – Snow Sprouts – Skiing for Ages 4 and 5 – PARENT/GUARDIAN PARTICIPATION REQUIRED

Must be 4 years old prior to 1/1/2026

Sow the seeds of winter fun with our program designed for young children. Parents or guardians join the small class of up to 5 students and are part of the learning process. Our instructors provide a safe, consistent learning environment and age-appropriate lessons for your child.  Parents/guardians need to participate in the lesson and be prepared to ride the lift with the child when the class is ready.

1 Class per day (2.5 hours)…………………………………………$675

Program 8 – Super Snow Sprouts – Skiing for Ages 5 and 6  – PARENT/GUARDIAN PARTICIPATION REQUIRED

The second part of our Snow Sprouts program continues for the “seasoned” skier. This class is for the student who can participate for the duration of the class with less involvement from parent or guardian. Small class size of up to 5 students. Parents/guardians need to participate and be prepared to ride the lift with the child.

1 Class per day (2.5 hours)…………………………………….$675

Program 9 – Skiing for Ages 6 and 7  

All Abilities ~ Levels 1-9

Our caring instructors give special attention to these classes, with an emphasis on safety and fun.  This course provides a rewarding learning environment while teaching the fundamentals of proper skiing.

1 Class per day (2.5 hours)……………………………………….$650

Program 10 – Skiing for Ages 8 through 12  

All Abilities ~ Levels 1-9

Our caring instructors give special attention to these classes, with an emphasis on safety and fun. This course provides a rewarding learning environment while teaching the fundamentals of proper skiing. This is one of our most popular programs, so sign up early!

1 Class per day (2.5 hours)……………………………….………$650

Program 11 – Skiing for Grade 6 thru Adult

All Abilities ~ Levels 1-9

This course is for those who wish to take up skiing for the first time or are looking to improve their skills with personalized attention from our instructors.

1 class per day (2.5 hours)………………………………………….$650
